name: TodayinSatelliteRadioSports
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Each morning we will preview some of the best games, interviews and shows that can be heard on SiriusXM Sports. We'll give you the radio channel numbers and let you know how you can listen on Alexa. If you don't have SiriusXM on your Echo device, just enable the SiriusXM Skill and link your account. I'm a guy that works for SiriusXM, but this is an unofficial hobby. Of course game times and channel numbers are subject to change
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
